text:
Mu gihugu cy'imisozi miremire n'ibibaya byiza, habayeho intambara ndende idasanzwe hagati y'abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije n'ikigo kimwe mpuzamahanga cyari gishaka guteza imbere imishinga ikomeye y'ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro. Iyo ntambara y'amategeko yahuruje isi yose kubera uburyo yashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku butabera n'uburenganzira bw'ikirere.

Iyi sosiyete, izwi ku izina rya "TerraCorp," yari ifite gahunda yo gukora ubucukuzi muri parike y'igihugu, ahantu hari harimo amoko menshi y'ibimera n'ibinyabuzima bidasanzwe. Ibyo byatumye abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije, bayobowe na Dr. Imbuto Nziza, bahagurukira guhagarika iyo mishinga. Dr. Nziza yari azwiho kuba intwari mu guharanira uburenganzira bw'ibidukikije no guharanira iterambere rirambye ridaheza.

Mu ntangiriro, abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije bifashishije ubushishozi mu gukusanya ibimenyetso bigaragaza ingaruka mbi zashoboraga guterwa n'uyu mushinga. Bakoresheje inyigo zinyuranye, berekana neza ko ibikorwa bya TerraCorp byari gutera ihindagurika rikomeye mu bidukikije, ibihombo ku bukungu bw'aho, ndetse no kubangamira imibereho y'abaturage b'aho.

TerraCorp ariko, nayo yari ifite itsinda rikomeye ry'abanyamategeko, ryarwanyaga bivuye inyuma ibisobanuro byatangwaga na Dr. Nziza n'itsinda rye. Bashyizemo imbaraga zifatikanya mu gukoresha intwaro zose zemewe mu mategeko ndetse no gukora ubuvugizi kugira ngo bagure umushinga wabo, bavuga ko bazana imirimo mishya n'iterambere ry'ubukungu muri aka gace.

Urubanza rwabereye mu rukiko rukuru rw'akarere, rukomeza kunyura mu bice bitandukanye, buri ruhande rwifashisha abahanga mu bumenyi na politike mu guharanira gutsinda. Uko iminsi yicumye, urubanza rwakomeje gukurura imbaga, ruvugwa mu binyamakuru mpuzamahanga ndetse no mu biganiro mpaka ku mateleviziyo.

Habayeho gushidikanya gukomeye hagati y'abaturage, bamwe bashyigikiye kurengera urusobe rw'ibidukikije abandi banyotewe n'amahirwe y'imibereho myiza yatangwaga n'uwo mushinga. Guverinoma y'igihugu nayo yari mu bibazo byinshi bitewe n'igihirahiro, itazi neza niba yateza imbere ibikorwa cyangwa yarengera ibidukikije.

Nyuma y'amezi macye urubanza rurimbanyije, hashize imyaka myinshi mu gukora ubushakashatsi no gutanga ibisobanuro, urukiko rwaje gufata umwanzuro ukomeye. Banzuye ko ibikorwa bya TerraCorp bihagarikwa burundu kuko ingaruka zabyo ku bidukikije zari nyinshi kandi zishobora kwangiza burundu ubuzima bw'ibihumbi by'abaturage ndetse n'ururange rw'ubusitani kimeza.

Uyu mwanzuro wabaye intsinzi ikomeye ku bashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije, ndetse n'intambwe ishimishije mu guharanira ko iterambere rigendana no kurengera ibidukikije. Byatumye ibihugu byinshi ku isi byongera kwibaza ku miyoborere y'imitungo n'uburyo bushya bwo gushakira umuti ikibazo gihoraho cy'ihindagurika ry’ikirere.

Nubwo intambara y'amategeko yari yararangiye, urugamba rwo guharanira urusobe rw'ibidukikije rwakomeje, buri wese yiga uko bakwishakamo ibisubizo bitangiza ibidukikije. Abasesenguzi bavuga ko iyi ntambara yari yamaze guhindura icyerekezo ndetse n'imyumvire ya benshi ku isi ku bijyanye n'ibarurishamibare ry'iterambere ritagira ingaruka ku bidukikije. Dr. Nziza yahise aba icyitegererezo, agaragaza neza ko gutsinda urugamba rw'ubutabera bishoboka igihe cyose umutima n'ubwenge by'abantu biri hamwe mu guharanira icyiza rusange.

Mu mwaka wa 2027, inkuru y'amateka y'isi yanditswe mu mategeko mu gihe ibintu byarushagaho kugaragara nabi ku isi yose. Iyi yari intambara y'amategeko idasanzwe hagati y'abashinzwe ibidukikije n'ikirangirire cya sosiyete mpuzamahanga izwi nka GloboCorp, sosiyete yinjiza akayabo ku isi mu bijyanye n’icukurwa ry'ibikomoka kuri peteroli, ibinyabutabire n'ubuhinzi.

Ibi byose byatangiye ubwo GloboCorp yatangazaga umugambi wo gutangira umushinga mushya wo gucukura ibitoro n’amakara mu ishyamba rya za Amazone, rumwe mu nkomoko zisigaye z’uburumbuke ku isi. Bahamagariraga abashoramari b’ingeri zose kugaragara bashikamye, bagaragaza uyu mushinga nk’igikorwa cy’ingenzi cyo kuzahura ubukungu bw’ibihugu by’Amajyepfo ashyira Uburasirazuba bw’imisozi miremire y’Amazone.

Ariko abashakashatsi ku bidukikije bahise babona ko uyu mushinga wari ugamije kuzambya ibidukikije kurushaho, ukaba n’igihombo kuri biosphere y’isi yose. Biyemeje guhangana na GloboCorp mu murongo w’amategeko, bahagurukira itegeko ry’isi ryo kurinda ibinyabuzima, bagaragaza ubushobozi butangaje mu guhuza intara n’abantu b’ingeri zose bifuza kubungabunga iki gice cy’isi.

Mu mbwirwaruhame idasanzwe, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa GloboCorp, Herman Vale, yagaragaje ko uyu mushinga ari ngombwa ku iterambere rihamye ry’isi, ndetse ko ibyo abashinjacyaha ku bidukikije babwira abatuye isi ari ibihuha bigamije gusa guhungabanya iterambere. Nyamara, imbere y'inkiko, abagaragara kuburanira ibidukikije bashimangiye ko kurengera ibidukikije atari ukubangamira iterambere, ahubwo ko ari ugutegura ahazaza h’ubuzima buri ku isi.

Impaka zari zose cyane mu rukiko rwa New York, aho abavoka b’impande zombi bakoraga ibishoboka byose bashingira ku bimenyetso bifatika. Ireme ry'ubumenyi bwerekanwa aho ryarushagaho gushimangira ko ibikorwa bya GloboCorp biramutse byemejwe, byatuma imihindagurikire mibi y’ikirere izamukaho cyane bigatuma ibihe bigorana kwihanganirwa ku kiremwamuntu.

Nyuma y’amezi abiri y’impaka z'urudaca, urukiko rwatanze umwanzuro udasanzwe. Rwasanze ibyo abashinjacyaha b’ibidukikije bavuga bifite ishingiro, rutegeka ko ibyemezo byose bijyanye no gucukura ibikoresho bya peteroli n’amakara bihagarikwa mu buryo bw’agateganyo muri iryo shyamba rigari.

Uyu mwanzuro wabaye insinzi idasanzwe ku bantu barengera ibidukikije ku isi yose, ariko nanone urigisha isomo rikomeye ku zindi sosiyete mpuzamahanga: iterambere ry’ubukungu ntirigomba guhonyora isi dutuye. Nyuma y'iyo ntsinzi, abashinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije bihutiye gushyiraho imigambi yo gusukura ingamba zitezimbere ubuhinzi n’ubucuruzi bibungabunga ubuzima bwo mu mazi no ku butaka.

GloboCorp yahise itangiza ibikorwa by'ivugurura ry'iyo nzira, yinjira mu mirongo mishya itangiza ibidukikije, nk’ingufu zisubira. Nikwo kwari ugutsinda kubona ko hari hakenewe impinduka mu mikorere yabo bagendeye ku migenzereze itari isanzwe. Iyo ntambara y’amategeko yabaye ikimenyetso cy’uko guharanira kurengera ibidukikije bigomba kuba ku mutima wemeza umuvuduko w’iterambere ku isi.

Mu gihugu cya Nyaburanga, hagaragaye intambara y'amategeko idasanzwe hagati y'abashinzwe ibidukikije n'isosiyete mpuzamahanga izwi ku izina rya EcoExtract Ltd. Iyi sosiyete yari imaze imyaka iteza imbere ibikorwa by’ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro, yerekana ko ifite gahunda yo gushora imari mu buryo burambye. Nyamara, ku rundi ruhande, abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije bavugaga ko iyi sosiyete yakoreshaga uburyo bwangiza bikomeye ibinyabuzima n'ubutaka bw'ibice byo mu ishyamba ry'inzitane ry'igihugu.

Ikibazo cyatangiye gufata indi ntera ubwo igikorwa cyo kwagura ubutaka bwo gucukura cyatangiraga mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2023. Abaturage baturiye iryo shyamba batangiye kwinubira ibyo bikorwa maze ikibazo kirakomeza kugeza ubwo hakwitabazwa inkiko. Urugaga rw'Abarengera Ibidukikije muri Nyaburanga (UIN) rwareze EcoExtract Ltd. mu rukiko rukuru rw'igihugu, ruvuga ko sosiyete yarenze ku mategeko yo kurengera ibidukikije no kunamira ubutaka bw'akarere.

Mu rukiko, abunganizi ba EcoExtract Ltd. bashimangiye ko ibikorwa byabo byemewe n'ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko nta ngaruka zifatika ku bidukikije. Bavugaga ko uko gucukura gukorwa hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga rigezweho ritangiza. Ariko, abaharanira ibidukikije baje mu rukiko bitwaje ibimenyetso birimo amashusho yerekana iterabwoba ku bimera n'inyamaswa, ndetse n'ubushakashatsi bwa siyansi bwerekanye ingaruka mbi ziterwa no gucukura muri ako gace.

Urubanza rwakomeje kumara iminsi icumi, abantu bose bareba uko bizagenda hagati y’impande zombi. Perezida w'urukiko, Madame Kamanzi Aline, yashyize imbere isesengura ryimbitse, aho yasabaga ibitabo byinshi by’umushinga wa EcoExtract Ltd. ndetse n’ubusesenguzi bwakozwe n'abahanga mu by'ibidukikije. Nyuma y’ibiganiro bimaze igihe, Madame Kamanzi yatanze umwanzuro ushobora gutungura benshi.

Yavuze ati: "Tuzi akamaro k'iterambere ry'ubukungu, ariko ntitwagombye gukomeza gushora imari mu bintu bibangamira ibidukikije bya Nyaburanga. Icyemezo kiratangajwe: EcoExtract Ltd. irasabwa guhagarika ibikorwa byayo n'ako kanya kugeza igihe hateguwe amabwiriza akomeye arengera ibidukikije kandi agafasha iterambere." 

Icyi cyemezo cy'urukiko cyaciye ibintu mu gihugu hose, abaturage benshi bashima intsinzi yabonetse, mu gihe abandi bifuzaga ko iterambere ry’ubukungu rikomeza. Nyuma y’iminsi micye gusa, EcoExtract Ltd. yatangaje ko izakora ibishoboka byose ngo yubahirize amategeko mashya kandi igakora ibishoboka byose ngo iterambere ribe irengera ibidukikije.

Iyi ntambara y’amategeko yabaye isomo rikomeye, rigaragaza ko iterambere ry’ubukungu rikwiye kujyana no kurengera ibidukikije, bigafasha kubaka ejo hazaza hateye imbere ariko hatunganye. Abaturage ba Nyaburanga bakomeje gushyigikira ibikorwa bigamije kurengera ibidukikije, baharanira ko ibyo batungiye amaso bitangizwa na za sosiyete mpuzamahanga zitita ku buzima bw’akarere.

Mu myaka yashize, inkuru zavugwaga ku isi zazahungabanyijwe n'ibibazo bitagira ingano by'ibidukikije. Ariko mu mwaka wa 2025, intambara idasanzwe y'amategeko yaratangijwe hagati y'abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije n'umuryango mpuzamahanga uzwi ku izina rya EcoGlobal Industries.

Uyu muryango, EcoGlobal Industries, wari umaze imyaka myinshi uzwiho gushyira imbere inyungu kurenza kurengera ibidukikije. Bafite inganda zikwirakwije ku migabane itandukanye zicukura amabuye y'agaciro, zikora ibikoresho, ndetse no gutunganya ibikomoka kuri peteroli. Bibwiraga ko ari abatsinze, kuko babonaga inyungu zikomeye mu mikorere yabo, bititaye ku ngaruka zahungabanyaga umubumbe.

Nyamara, ibintu byatangiye guhinduka ubwo igice cy'abashinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije cyakwiriye ku isi hose cyitwaga "Save Our Earth Coalition". Bamaze kubona ibikorwa bya EcoGlobal bigira ingaruka ndende ku bidukikije, batangiye gukusanya ibimenyetso byimbitse bigaragaza uruhare rw'iyi sosiyete mu kwangiza ibidukikije. Ibi byagiye bishyirwa ahabona binyuze mu nyandiko, amashusho ndetse n'inyandiko-mvugo z'abakozi b'iyi sosiyete bahishuriye ibyo babonye.

Mu kwezi kwa Mata 2025, Save Our Earth Coalition yatanze ikirego mu rukiko rw'akarere ka Hague, isaba ko ibisubizo by'imyitwarire mibi ya EcoGlobal bigomba gusuzumwa, ndetse hagafatwa ibyemezo bikomeye byo kubahana ku gikorwa cyo kwangiza ibidukikije. Ibimenyetso byatanzwe byashinjaga iyi sosiyete ibyaha byo kwangiza inyanja, gutema amashyamba y'inshuti, no kwanduza umwuka ku buryo butagereranywa.

Ibirego byarakomeye, kandi EcoGlobal Industries ntabwo yicaye ubusa. Batangiye kugabanya imikorere y'urugomo, bashaka abavoka bakomeye, ndetse bagerageza no gushaka abahanga mu bidukikije by'ikinyoma ngo babarebere izuba. Bavuze ko ibyo bakoze byari ku nyungu rusange, no guteza imbere imibereho myiza y'abaturage babaga mu turere bafiteho ibikorwa.

Igihe urubanza rwari rugitangira, ibitangazamakuru ku isi byose byari byashyize amaso kuri iki kirego. Byari bibaye ubwa mbere mu mateka y'isi aho sosiyete mpuzamahanga itsinda urubanza nk’uru. Mu gihe urubanza rwakomezaga, impande zombi zagaragaje imbaraga nyinshi mu mikoranire n'abantu, yaba ari abafana n'abatavuga rumwe nabo.

Icyakora, nyuma y'umwaka wose w'iburanisha, uru rubanza rwaje kugera ku ndunduro. Urukiko rwatanze umwanzuro ko EcoGlobal Industries yahanwa bikomeye kubera uruhare rwayo mu kwangiza ibidukikije. Byasabye iyi sosiyete gucibwa ihazabu ikomeye cyane ndetse banategekwa gukora imishinga yo gusana ibyangiritse, birimo kongera gutera amashyamba, gusukura inyanja ndetse no kuba umufatanyabikorwa mu gutanga ingufu zisukuye.

Uyu mwanzuro wabaye intsinzi ikomeye ku bashinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije, ndetse byatumye isi ifata intambwe nshya mu gucunga neza umutungo kamere no kugabanya ibikorwa bibi by'imihindagurikire y'ikirere. Ibi byerekanye ko n’ubwo sosiyete zikomeye zishobora kugira imbaraga, ibyashingiwe ku kuri n'ubutabera bihora biza imbere. Kandi, intambara y'amategeko yarangiye neza, ibidukikije byabonye insinzi kandi isi yose yigira ku makosa yakozwe na EcoGlobal Industries.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi miremire cyitwa Rugira, aho imigezi yisuka hagati y'ibibaya byimbutse, intambara y'amategeko ishingiye ku bidukikije yahagurukije imbaga. Iyo ntambara yari hagati y'ikigo gikomeye kitwa "GreenFuture International" n'itsinda ry'abashakashatsi n'abashinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije ryo muri Rugira, ryitwaga "Abarinzi ba Rugira".

Byose byatangiye ubwo sosiyete "GreenFuture International", ifite icyicaro gikomeye mu gihugu cy'amahanga, yamenyekanishaga umugambi wo gushora imari mu mushinga ukomeye wo kubaka uruganda rw'amashanyarazi rukoresha imirasire ku nkengero z'ishyamba rya Nyirabirunga, rimwe mu mashyamba y'ibanze kandi avangwa mu gihugu.

Iri shyamba ryari rifite akamaro kanini ku ruhande rw'imikurire y'ubukungu bw'abaturiye ako gace, kubera ko ryari rikungahaye ku bimera na za nyamaswa z'amoko atandukanye, ndetse rikaba ikiraro gikomeye ku bwoko bw’inyoni ziyovehagurika ziva mu majyaruguru zikerekeza amajyepfo ya Afurika. Abaturage ba Rugira bakundaga gutemberera mu ishyamba, kandi ryari isoko y'umuco n'umurage kuri bo.

"Abarinzi ba Rugira", itsinda rigizwe n'abahanga mu by'ubumenyi bw'isi, abanyamategeko, n'abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, nta gushidikanya bongeye kurwana inkundura ngo bahagarike uwo mushinga. Bagaragaje impungenge zerekeranye n’ingaruka mbi z’umushinga ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, kandi berekana akamaro k’iryo shyamba mu kugabanya CO2 n’ihindagurika ry’ikirere.

Mu rundi ruhande, "GreenFuture International" yavugaga ko urwo ruganda rwari gutanga ingufu z’amashanyarazi azagira uruhare mu kuzahura ubukungu bw’akarere, ndetse rukaba rushyigikira gahunda yo kugabanya guhumanya ikirere hirya no hino ku isi binyuze mu gukoresha ingufu zisubira. Sosiyete yaharaniraga ko icyemezo cyo kubaka uruganda gihabwa umugisha wemewe n’amategeko.

Urubanza rwatangiye mu rukiko rw’igihugu rw’i Rugira, ariko ibyabereye mu rukiko byari nk’umukino wa sinema. Abanyamategeko ba "GreenFuture International" bageragezaga kugaragaza inyungu zo mu bukungu n'iterambere, mu gihe "Abarinzi ba Rugira" bashoraga ibimenyetso bifite umutwaro uremereye ku ngaruka mbi z’iterambere ry’ubukungu ritakaza ibidukikije bitagereranywa.

Imyigaragambyo ikaze yatangiye mu mijyi itandukanye ya Rugira, abantu bitwaje ibyapa, baririmba indirimbo zitaka imbaraga z’ishyamba rya Nyirabirunga, abandi bateranya inkunga mu mishinga itarambiranye yo kubungabunga iryo shyamba. Abatuye amahanga nabo batangiye kumva iyo nkuru, inkunga zituruka imihanda yose zikomereza kubageraho.

Mu gihe cy'umwaka wose, iteranirizo ryo mu nkiko ndetse no hanze yazo ryakomeje. Impaka hagati y'impande zombi zasubikirwagaho inshuro nyinshi, ndetse n’abacamanza ubwabo babahoza ku mpapuro z’ubumenyi bw’isi batigeze babona bigezeho mbere.

Amaherezo, urukiko rwafashe icyemezo kidashidikanywaho: kubaka uruganda byarahagaritswe. Hemejwe ko ibikorwa byose bishobora kugira ingaruka ku bidukikije bikomeye cyangwa kubaturage bigomba kubanza kwigwaho n’inzobere z'abahanga mu by'isi umwaka ushobore cyangwa uwundi.

Icyemezo cyo guhagarika umushinga mu buryo burambye cyishimiwe n'abakunda ibidukikije n'abaturage ba Rugira. Gusa, bahisemo gukomeza gukorana na "GreenFuture International" mu buryo bushya, gahunda yo gushora imari mu bikorwa byinjiza amafaranga adahungabanya ibidukikije irashimangirwa.

Urugamba rw’amategeko rwahagaritswe, ariko byose bikaba byabaye isomo ku isi yose: iterambere nyaryo rigomba kwitabira guhuriza hamwe inyungu z'ibiremwa byose n'ahazaza h'amazuyo. Rugira yahindutse ikimenyetso cy’ubumwe n’imyumvire iboneye, imbere y’umutwe w’inzego za politiki n’iterambere ku isi yose.

Mu mwaka wa 2025, isi yugarijwe n'ikibazo gikomeye cy'ihumana ry'ibidukikije, byatumye ubushyamirane bukomeye bututumba hagati y'abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije n'amasosiyete mpuzamahanga akomeye mu isi. Iyo ntambara y'amategeko yamamaye ku izina rya "Intambara y'Ibidukikije".

Kuri mikorowasi y'isi yose, sosiyete yitwa GLOBE-CORP yari ifite umuvumo wo kuba umuterankunga ukomeye w'iterambere ry'ubukungu ariko nanone ikajya ishinjwa guhonyora amategeko arengera ibidukikije. N'ubwo yashoraga akayabo mu mishinga y'ubucukuzi bw'amabuye y'agaciro no gukora ibindi bikorwa byangiza, yashatse kugaragara nk'ifite politiki yita ku bidukikije ishyiraho ibigo byitwa Eco-Consciousness.

Ku rundi ruhande, itsinda rikomeye ry'abaharanira kurengera ibidukikije ryitwa Green Guardians ntabwo ryari ryicishirije. Bakusanyirije hamwe abahanga mu by'amategeko n'abanya-politiki bashaka impinduramatwara maze batangira gukurikirana inkiko GLOBE-CORP. Bahagurukiye hamwe bavuga ko ubwisanzure n'ububasha iyi sosiyete yihaye bibangamiye impera nziza y'isi.

Ibirego byahereye mu rukiko mpuzamahanga rw'i La Haye, aho Green Guardians bashinje GLOBE-CORP gutera inkunga ibikorwa by'umwanda no kwangiza ikirere mu bushake. Mu rubanza rw'amategeko rwateye ubwoba abatari bake, impande zombi zatanguranwe gukusanya ibimenyetso bifatika. GLOBE-CORP yashyizemo akayabo mu gutanga ruswa no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu guhimba ibimenyetso by’uko ibyo bikorwa nta ngaruka mbi bigira.

Aho imirwano yo mu nkiko yari igeze gushyuhira, ishyirahamwe rishinzwe kurengera ibidukikije ryageze ku bimenyetso bidashidikanywaho: ibaruwa zashyize ahagaragara uburyo iyi sosiyete yashukishaga abayobozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bihugu bikennye gukomeza ibikorwa byayo. Uruhare rw’itangazamakuru ryigenga rwabaye urufunguzo maze rwirukankana inkuru ku isi yose, bivumbura nandi mabanga menshi yobereye ubushyamirane.

Byatangiriye mu nkiko, ariko byaje kurangira bivuyemo imyigaragambyo hirya no hino ku isi no guteza urujijo mu bigo by’ubucuruzi ndetse n’imiryango mpuzamahanga. Abaturage benshi, barimo n'ireo batashishikajwe cyane n'ibidukikije, biyunze k’uruhande rwa Green Guardians bityo uburakari buragwira.

Umwaka umwe w’intambara y’amategeko warashize Maze mu mpera z'uwo mwaka, Urukiko rw'i La Haye rwararangaye maze rufata umwanzuro utigeze ubaho mbere. Habayeho urubanza rurimo gucibwa ihoni n’inzibacyuho ku GLOBE-CORP n’amande y’umurengera, ndetse hategetswe kunoza umuvuno mushya wo gucungira hafi ibikorwa byose by’iyi sosiyete. Iki cyemezo cyakomereye urwego rw’ubucuruzi ariko kandi kigaragaza intsinzi imwe itazibagirana mu mateka y’uwo murimo wo kurengera ibidukikije.

Iyi ntambara y'amategeko yarushijeho guhungabanya imikorere y'amasosiyete mpuzamahanga, bikurura umwanya w'ingenzi w'ubumenyi no kwibaza ku hazaza h'iterambere ry'isi. Byatanze kandi isomo ku ruhare rw’abaturage n’ibigo bishingiye ku bwitege, mu guharanira iterambere rikarishye n’ubushake bwo guhindura imikorere no kurengera isi mbere y'ibindi byose.

Mu mwaka wa 2025, mu mujyi utuje wa Elmbrook, hatangiye intambara y'amategeko idasanzwe hagati y'abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije n'isosiyete mpuzamahanga ikomeye yitwa GlobalCore Industries. Iki kibazo cyatangiye kubyukira igihe abanyamuryango b'umuryango udaharanira inyungu witwa "Green Horizon" babonaga ko ibikorwa bya GlobalCore byangiza bikabije ibidukikije.

Byose byatangiye mu mpeshyi ya 2024 ubwo GlobalCore yatangazaga umugambi wayo wo kwagura uruganda rwayo rukora ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga muri uyu mujyi. Uru ruganda rwari runyura neza mu gufasha abaturage kubona imirimo, ariko hari hagiye kuzamuka ikibazo gikomeye cy’imyuka ihumanya ndetse no kwangirika kw'ubutaka. Abashakashatsi bo muri "Green Horizon" bari bamaze kubikurikirana igihe kirekire, ndetse bafite ibimenyetso simusiga by'uko iyo myuka yahungabanya bikomeye ubuzima bw'abaturage.

Green Horizon yahise itangiza ikirego cy’amategeko ku rwego rw’igihugu, yishingikirije ku ngingo y'amategeko y'ibidukikije ivuga ko ibikorwa byose bigomba kubahiriza igipimo ntarengwa cy’imyuka ihumanya. Mu rubanza, abavoka b'ikigo GlobalCore barimo umugabo uzwiho ubuhanga, Jacob Thornton, bari bafite ingamba zo kwerekana ko ibikorwa byabo byubahiriza amategeko ndetse banateye intambwe zitandukanye mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rishya mu kugabanya ihumana.

N'ubwo GlobalCore yarwanaga ishyaka, ikirego cyatewe inkunga na dosiye ndende y’ibigaragaza ingaruka mbi z’imyuka ihumanya y’inganda zabo, bigizwe n’amashusho ya satellite, imibare y’abantu barwaye indwara z’ubuhumekero, n'ubuhamya bukomeye bw’abaturage igeze kurutonde rwa Green Horizon.

Urubanza rwakomeje kumara amezi menshi, rwerekeza ku manza mu rukiko rukuru rw’igihugu. Ubushinjacyaha bwa Green Horizon bwasobanuye neza ukuntu uburenganzira bwo kugira ibidukikije bifunze kandi byiza ari ingenzi cyane kurusha inyungu za kinyamwuga z’isosiyete imwe. Imvugo yabo yakurura induru y’ibihe ku isi aho abantu benshi batangiye kujya mu mihanda basaba ko haboneka iterambere rirambye.

Ku munsi wa nyuma w’uko urubanza, mu manza zigoye, umucamanza yafashe icyemezo kirimo impande zombi. GlobalCore yagombaga kurugurura ibikorwa byo kugabanya imyuka ihumanya ikoresha inganda zabo, ndetse bagatanga imfashanyo yo kugoboka abaturage bahuye n’ingaruka z’imyuka yabo mu myaka yashize. Naho Green Horizon yemerewe uruhare mu ishyirwaho ry'ugenzura ry'igisubizo nyakuri ku gushyirwa mu bikorwa izo ngamba.

Iyi ntsinzi mu rukiko yabaye isoko y'ibyishimo bikomeye ku bashinzwe kwita ku bidukikije ku isi yose, kandi ishimangira ko n'ubwo amasosiyete manini afite ubushobozi, uburenganzira bw'abaturage bwo kugira ibidukikije byiza bushobora gutsinda. Mu gihe hari ibyishimo, hagiye habaho no kumva neza ko urugamba rukomeje, kandi ko hagikenewe gukomeza kubaho ubushake bwo kugera ku iterambere rirambye mu kinyejana gishya cy'ikoranabuhanga.

Mu gihugu cy'akoraboneza, hashyizweho amategeko mashya agamije kurengera ibidukikije, yasohotse nyuma y'imyaka myinshi y'ingorane n'ingaruka zituruka ku bikorwa by'inganda. Aya mategeko yarakaje cyane inganda zikora ibikoresho bikomoka kuri peteroli, cyane cyane sosiyete mpuzamahanga yitwa "PetroLux", ifite ibikorwa byinshi mu gihugu.

Iyi sosiyete yari isanzwe izwiho kugira uruhare rukomeye mu kwangiza ibidukikije, harimo kwanduza amazi n'umwuka. Imiryango ishinzwe kurengera ibidukikije, nka "GreenFuture Initiative", yishimiye cyane kubona aya mategeko akozwe, kuko yari intambwe ikomeye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije by'igihugu.

Gusa, "PetroLux" ntiyicaye ubusa. Bashoye imari idasanzwe mu rwego rwo gukemura iki kibazo cy’amategeko mu rukiko, bagamije kuyavuga amategeko ko arenganye uburenganzira bwayo bw’ubucuruzi no guteza imbere iterambere ry’ubukungu mu gihugu. Iyi sosiyete ikoresheje itsinda ry'abanyamategeko bayo bashoboye kandi bazobereye mu manza mpuzamahanga.

Ku rundi ruhande, "GreenFuture Initiative" itegerezwa guhangana na "PetroLux" muri uru rubanza rukomeye. Bafite itsinda ry'abanyamategeko nabo bafite ubuhanga bukomeye mu mategeko mpuzamahanga y'ibidukikije, kandi bifashishwa n'abahanga mu by'ubumenyi bw’isi ndetse n'abashakashatsi mu by'ibidukikije kugira ngo bashyigikire injyana yabo muri uru rubanza.

Intambara y'amategeko yari ihangayikishije abaturage benshi, kuko ibyemezo byakomezaga kubuzwa gushyirwa mu bikorwa byatumaga ibihugu byinshi byitabira. Ku munsi wa mbere w'urubanza, urukiko rwari rufite intebe izahorana imanza z'ingenzi.

Mu rukiko, Sosiyete "PetroLux" yazanye ibimenyetso byinshi byerekana uruhare rwayo mu iterambere ry’ubukungu bw’igihugu mu myaka yashize, ndetse n’inkunga yatangaga mu bikorwa bifasha abaturage. Bavugaga ko amategeko mashya azatuma babura ubushobozi bwo gutanga aya mahirwe, bityo abayobozi b’igihugu bakwiye gutekereza ku ngaruka zo gukoresha amategeko akarishye.

Ku rundi ruhande, "GreenFuture Initiative" yerekanye amashusho n’amakuru agaragaza kwangirika kw’isi no ku buzima bw’abaturage bitewe n’ibikorwa bya "PetroLux". Bagaragaje kandi icyifuzo cy’uko amasosiyete akomeye nk’iyo yagakwiye gusigasira ibidukikije by’aho ikorera kurusha gushakira inyungu gusa.

Urukiko rwamaze iminsi itatu rwumva ibisobanuro by’impande zombi, hakurikiraho iminsi ibiri y'ifatwa ry'imyanzuro n'isesengura ry'imibare na raporo zitandukanye. Nyuma y'icyumweru kimwe, byari byitezwe ko umucamanza mukuru azatanga umwanzuro ukomeye.

Ariko mu gihe abantu benshi bari bategereje umwanzuro wa nyuma, intumwa z’ibihugu bindi byakoranye inama hamwe n’abahagarariye amakuru mpuzamahanga, basaba ko impande zose zikwiye kugera ku masezerano y’ubwumvikane ashingiye ku ntego z’iterambere rirusange.

Ku butumire bw’inama idasanzwe yakozwe ku bufatanye n’ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye, "PetroLux" n’indi miryango yahuriye mu nama yabereye ku murwa mukuru w’igihugu. Mu kwezi kumwe, ibyamaze kuganirwaho byashyizwe ahagaragara bigaragaza ko habonetse n’ubwumvikane buzatuma haboneka iterambere ry’impande zombi.

Abantu benshi barishimye cyane biturutse kuri iyi ntambara y’amategeko yarangiye ku bwumvikane, bikorwa kandi mu buryo burengera ibidukikije. Ayo ni amateka mashya yashyizweho, igihamya ko iterambere n'umutekano w’isi bifite uko bigomba kubangikanywa. Abayobozi b’amahanga n’abashinzwe ibidukikije bahimbye izina ry’amasezerano "Ubumwe Bwa Akoraboneza", bishyiraho ikitegererezo cyiza cy’ubufatanye ku isi yose.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi miremire, haje kuvuka intambara y'amategeko itari isanzwe, itangira nk'ikirere giteye inkeke hagati y'abashinzwe kurengera ibidukikije n'isosiyete mpuzamahanga yari yarahigiye kubyaza umusaruro umutungo kamere w'icyo gihugu.

Iyi sosiyete, izwi ku izina rya EcoExtract Global, yari yarabonye icyangombwa cyo gucukura amabuye y'agaciro afite akamaro gakomeye mu kubaka ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga rikataje. Gusa uwo mutungo wari uturuka mu ishyamba ry'urubyarukundo, aho amoko atabarika y'inyamaswa n'ibimera biri mu marembera byarangiraga kwikanga. 

Abashinzwe ibidukikije bo muri icyo gihugu, bayobowe n'uwitwaga Kumiro Ndikumana, batangiye urugamba rukomeye rwo kuburizamo uwo mushinga. Ndikumana n’itsinda rye bagaragaje umuhate mwinshi mu kubuza EcoExtract Global kugera ku ntego yayo, bitwaje ibyemezo bya siyansi n'uburenganzira bw'imiturire y'abakikije ayo mashyamba.

Urubanza rwatangiye gufata indi ntera ubwo Ndikumana yinjiraga ku itangazamakuru agaragaza uburyo iyo sosiyete ifite isura mbi yo gusesagura ibidukikije mu bihugu bitandukanye ku isi. Ibyo byateje umwuka mubi mu mikoranire y’igihugu na EcoExtract Global, ndetse bituma isosiyete yishyira mu maboko y'abanyamategeko bayo bashoboye cyane.

Mu rukiko, byari bimeze nk'intambara y'amasasu. EcoExtract Global yifashishije amakuru y'akazi keza kayo ko guteza imbere ubukungu, ikemeza ko ibikorwa byayo byafasha igihugu gukemura ibibazo by’ubushomeri n’ubukene. Byari ibintu binyuze amatwi, ariko abayobozi b'ibidukikije nabo bari bafite intwaro. Bari bafite ubuhamya bwa ba muturage bato bato, n’amashusho agaragaza uruhare rudasubirwaho rw'iryo shyamba mu kurinda ihindagurika ry’ikirere.

Iminsi yo kuburanisha yari irimo ibigwi byinshi. Abaturage batandukanye baturukaga mu mpande zitandukanye z'igihugu baje gushyigikira Ndikumana mu rukiko, bafite ibyapa n'indirimbo zishyigikira kurengera ibidukikije. Hari n'ibyatangaje benshi aho ab'inkwakuzi mu ikoranabuhanga batungura rubanda, bakoresheje gahunda z'ikoranabuhanga bamenyesha amahanga iby’uru rubanza mu buryo bwa digitale.

Nyuma y’amezi menshi, ibyiringiro byari byose ku mpande zombi, umucamanza mukuru yaje kubona ko ikibazo arimo atari icyo kumvikana gusa ku mujyi umwe cyangwa igihugu kimwe. Ni ikibazo cyo kurengera isi n'umutungo wacu wa rusange. Mu gushyiraho inyikirizo y'amategeko, umucamanza yanzuye ko EcoExtract Global igomba guhagarika ibikorwa byayo, ahubwo ikajya ishyira imbaraga mu guhanga udushya tw’ubumenyi bujyanye no gukora ku buryo butangiza ubutaka n'ishyamba.

Ako kazu gatsinze ka sosiyete gakomeza mu gukomeza uyu mushinga ariko mu nzira itandukanye, aho yafatanyaga n'abashinzwe ibidukikije mu kuzuza ibyo yari yariyemeje yirinda kwangiza ibidukikije, bigatuma isura yayo isubirana agaciro mu ruhando mpuzamahanga.

Iyi ndahiro y'amategeko yahindutse urugero ku isi hose, yerekana uko iterambere n'ibidukikije bishobora kugendana. Indoro n’icyizere bishya byatumye amashyamba y'icyo gihugu akomeza guhungabanya amasano n'abantu, abatuye umugabane wose bagatera intambwe muri byinshi badatekerezaga ko bishoboka mu mahoro no gushyira hamwe.

Mu gihe cy'impeshyi ya 2025, inkuru yakangaranyije amahanga yari yatangiye kugaragara mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye. Inkuru yari yerekeye intambara y’amategeko mpimbano hagati y’abahoza ijisho ku bidukikije n’isosiyete mpuzamahanga yitwa GlobalEco Mining Co. Iyi sosiyete yari izwiho gucukura amabuye y'agaciro mu bice bitandukanye by'isi.

Mu ntangiriro, GlobalEco Mining Co. yagaragara nk'isosiyete ishyira imbere kurengera ibidukikije. Baratangaga raporo zerekana uburyo batekereza ku bidukikije mu bicukuzi byabo, ndetse bagasinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye n’imiryango itandukanye yo kurengera ibidukikije. Gusa, muri Kamena 2025, umuryango mpuzamahanga urengera ibidukikije witwa EarthGuardians wahishuye raporo yihishe yerekana ko GlobalEco Mining Co. ikoresha amayeri yo kubeshya mu bibazo bibangamiye ibidukikije. Iyi raporo yari irimo amafoto, amashusho, n'amabaruwa yo mu biro by’iyi sosiyete agaragaza ko itemba y’amazi mabi iva mu gucukura amabuye ajugunywa mu migezi no mu bishanga.

Raporo ikimara gusohoka, EarthGuardians yihutiye kurega GlobalEco Mining Co. mu rukiko mpuzamahanga rwita ku bihano ku bujura n’ubwo hakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga rikomeye muri gahunda z'iterambere (International Tribunal for Environmental Justice – ITEJ). Yashinjaga iyi sosiyete kurenga ku mategeko mpuzamahanga akomeye arengera ibidukikije. ITEJ yihutiye kwakira ikirego maze ihamagaza impande zombi mu rukiko.

Mu rukiko, intambara yabaye ndende. GlobalEco Mining Co. yahakanye ibyo yashinjwaga yose, ivuga ko imikorere yayo yose yumvaga ndetse yubahiriza amategeko yose mpuzamahanga, kandi ko EarthGuardians bigendera gusa ku bilgango bidafite gihamya. Baje gushyira hanze abahanga muri siyansi bakomeye, bavuga ko raporo za EarthGuardians zishingiye ku makuru y’ukuri. Gusa, EarthGuardians bo baje gukomeza kwerekana ibimenyetso byabo bigizwe n’amafoto y’ibanga, amakuru yo mu bwihisho yavuye imbere muri sosiyete, ndetse n’amashusho yerekanaga ingaruka z’ibikorwa bya GlobalEco Mining mu mihindagurikire y’ikirere n’ubuzima bw’ibinyabuzima biba mu muri ako karere.

Mu gihe cy’amezi icumi uru rubanza rwakomeje, ibihugu byinshi nabyo byabaye nk’aho bihabwa inkunga ziva kuri GlobalEco Mining Co. byashidikanyaga ku bimenyetso bya EarthGuardians. Nyamara, ibindi bihugu, cyane cyane ibyo muri Amerika y’amajyepfo na Afurika, byashyiraga igitutu gikomeye kuri iriya sosiyete, bivuga ko abaturage babyo bari bahuye n’ingaruka zikomeye z’imikorere ya GlobalEco Mining.

Bidatinze, urukiko rwaje gufata icyemezo kidakanganye ariko cy’imyaka irindwi y’igihano cy’inkiko kumashami yose y’iyi sosiyete aho ikorera hose. Hasabwe gukorwa uburyo bwo gusubiza ibidukikije uko byari bimeze kera ndetse kuzakora inshingano zo gutanga ubushakashatsi bwo gukosora ibyo bangije.

Icyavsura aya mategeko mpimbano yanafashe umwanya munini kuburyo impinduka zatewe iki kibazo cyagize that's sekwe akenshi, byatumye habaho ishoramari rikomeye rihuza ibigihugu mu rwego rw’isi mu buvumbuzi no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu bijyanye no kugabanya ingaruka z'ibikorwa by'iterambere ku bidukikije. Inzira y’uburinganire yagaragaye, ndetse isiga n’inyigisho ku masosiyete yagiyeho mu myaka izaza ushaka guhabwa ibimenyetso bifatika by’uko ibikorwa byabo bizahaza ibidukikije no kuzigirira abaturage.
